reference.title: Tools for Sourdough Enthusiasts
reference.shortdesc: Sourdough bread baking requires specific tools and equipment to ensure a successful and enjoyable baking experience.

strow.stentry: A round or oval-shaped basket used for the final rise of the dough to maintain the shape.
A heavy, lidded pot used for baking that traps steam, creating a crispy crust.
Used to score the bread's surface before baking, allowing the dough to expand evenly.
A versatile tool for dividing, shaping and handling dough.
Used to line the Dutch oven, preventing sticking and making it easier to transfer the dough.
Prevents crust from becoming soggy while bread cools after baking.
Used to ensure the bread is baked to the right internal temperature.
